mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (username, password, email, role, status, created_at) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{role}, 1, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET username = #{username}, email = #{email}, avatar = #{avatar}, password = #{password}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user ORDER BY created_at DESC
